animeTitle: Ranma ½: Kessen Tougenkyou! Hanayome wo Torimodose!
animeDescription: Ranma and the gang are invited to a boating trip with Kuno. Unfortunately, a storm destroys the yacht and everyone is stranded on a remote island. The whole situation goes even more awry when one by one, the girls disappear without a trace. Ranma then finds out that the girls are abducted by Toma, ruler of the island, as part of his personal harem.  (Source: ANN)
animeRelated: ['Ranma ½', 'Ranma ½: Chou Musabetsu Kessen! Ranma Team vs. Densetsu no Houou']
